channel.title: Running My Server!
channel.description:
I have testscape I can not run the "runserver.bat" reason: 'Javac is not rec...' Blah Blah I hate this error and it was working one day then wasn't the next, would be appreciated if you can help me, I use compile to run the server at the min. Another reason is that i can not run moparscape as i get the same error code.
Run sever: @echo off title TestScape Server java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
I have not edited that at all.

u have to install the new java and set enviromental variables

item.title: Running My Server!
item.dc:creator: @Razza0wnz Razza0wnz
item.description:
@Razza0wnz wrote:

I have testscape I can not run the “runserver.bat” reason: ‘Javac is not rec…’ Blah Blah I hate this error and it was working one day then wasn’t the next, would be appreciated if you can help me, I use compile to run the server at the min. Another reason is that i can not run moparscape as i get the same error code.

Run sever:
@echo off
title TestScape Server
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

I have not edited that at all.

Read full topic
